Verses: 1 annaalile Theboraalum Apinogaamin Kumaaran Paaraakkum Paadinadhaavadhu:
2 karththar Isravelukkaaga Needhiyai Sarikkattinadhinimiththamum, Janangal Manappoorvamaaith Thangalai Oppukkoduththadhinimiththamum Avarai Sthoththiriyungal.
3 raajaakkale, Kelungal; Adhipadhigale, Sevikodungal; Naan Karththaraippaadi Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraik Keerththanampannuven.
4 karththaave, Neer Seyeerilirundhu Purappattu, Edhomin Veliyilirundhu Nadandhuvarugaiyil, Boomi Adhirndhadhu, Vaanam Sorindhadhu, Megangalum Thanneeraaip Pozhindhadhu.
5 karththarukku Munbaagap Parvadhangal Karaindhadhu; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Seenaayum Karaindhadhu.
6 aanaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Samkaarin Naatkalilum, Yaagelin Naatkalilum, Perumpaadhaigal Paazhaaik Kidandhadhu; Vazhi Nadakkiravargal Pakkavazhiyaai Nadandhaargal.
7 theboraalaagiya Naan Ezhumbumalavum, Isravelile Naan Thaayaaga Ezhumbumalavum, Graamangal Paazhaaippoyina, Isravelin Graamangal Paazhaaippoyina.
8 noodhana Dhevargalaith Therindhukondaargal; Appozhudhu Yuththam Vaasalvaraiyum Vandhadhu; Isravelile Naarpadhinaayiram Perukkulle Kedagamum Eettiyum Kaanappattadhundo?
9 janangalukkulle Thangalai Manappoorvamaai Oppukkoduththa Isravelin Adhipadhigalai En Irudhayam Naadugiradhu; Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal.
10 vellaik Kazhudhaigalinmel Erugiravargale, Nyaayasthalaththil Veetrirukkiravargale, Vazhiyil Nadakkiravargale, Idhaip Prasthaabiyungal.

11 thanneer Mondukollum Idangalil Vilveerarin Iraichchalukku Neenginavargal Ange Karththarin Needhinyaayangalaiyum , Avar Isravelilulla Thamadhu Graamangalukku Seydha Needhinyaayangalaiyume Prasthaabappaduththuvaargal; Adhumudhal Karththarin Janangal Olimuga Vaasalgalile Poi Iranguvaargal.
12 vizhi, Vizhi, Theboraale, Vizhi, Vizhi, Paattuppaadu; Paaraakke, Ezhumbu; Apinogaamin Kumaarane, Unnai Siraiyaakkinavargalai Siraiyaakkik Kondupo.
13 meedhiyaayirundhavargal Janaththin Prabukkalai Aalumpadiseydhaar; Karththar Enakkup Paraakkiramasaaligalin Mel Aalugai Thandhaar.

14 amalekkukku Virodhamaaga Ivargaludaiya Ver Eppiraayeemilirundhu Thulirththadhu; Un Janangalukkulle Benyameen Manushar Unakkup Pinsendraargal; Maageerilirundhu Adhipadhigalum, Sebulonilirundhu Ezhudhukolaip Pidikkiravargalum Irangivandhaargal.

15 isakkaarin Prabukkalum Theboraalode Irundhaargal; Paaraakkaippola Isakkaar Manusharum Pallaththaakkil Kaalnadaiyaai Anuppappattup Ponaargal; Roobanin Pirivinaigalaal Undaana Irudhayaththin Ninaivugal Migudhi.
16 mandhaigalin Saththaththaik Ketka, Nee Thozhuvangalin Naduve Irundhuvittadhenna? Roobanin Pirivinaigalaal Manovisaarangal Migudhi.
17 keeleyaadh Manushar Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyile Irundhuvittaargal; Thaan Manushar Kappalgalil Thangiyirundhadhenna? Aaser Manushar Kadarkaraiyile Thangi, Thangal Kudaakkalil Thaabariththaargal .
18 sebulonum Napthaliyum Porkkalaththu Munaiyile Thangal Uyirai Ennaamal Maranaththukkuth Thunindhu Nindraargal.
19 raajaakkal Vandhu Yuththampanninaargal; Appozhudhu Kaanaaniyarin Raajaakkal Megidhovin Thanneer Arugaana Thaanaakkile Yuththampanninaargal; Avargalukkuth Dhiraviyakkollai Kidaikkavillai.
20 vaanaththilirundhu Yuththam Undaayitru; Natchaththirangal Thangal Ayanangalilirundhu Siseraavode Yuththam Pannina.
21 keeson Nadhi, Poorvanadhiyaagiya Keeson Nadhiye, Avargalai Adiththukkondupoyitru; En Aaththumaave, Nee Balavaangalai Midhiththaai.
22 appozhudhu Kudhiraigalin Kulambugal, Paaichchalinaale, Balavaangalin Paaichchalinaaleye, Pilandhupoyina.

23 merosai Sabiyungal; Adhin Kudigalai Sabikkave Sabiyungal Endru Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Sollugiraar; Avargal Karththar Patchaththil Thunainirka Varavillai; Paraakkiramasaaligalukku Virodhamaai Avargal Karththar Patchaththil Thunai Nirka Varavillaiye.
24 sthreegalukkulle Keniyanaana Eperin Manaiviyaagiya Yaagel Aaseervadhikkappattaval, Koodaaraththil Vaasamaayirukkira Sthreegalukkulle Aval Aaseervadhikkappattavale.
25 thanneeraik Kettaan, Paalaikkoduththaal; Raajaakkalin Kinniyile Venneyaik Konduvandhu Koduththaal.
26 than Kaiyaal Aaniyaiyum, Than Valadhukaiyaal Thozhilaalarin Suththiyaiyum Pidiththu, Siseraavai Adiththaal; Avan Netriyil Uruvakkadaavi, Avan Thalaiyai Udaiththuppottaal.
27 aval Kaal Aruge Avan Madangi Vizhundhukidandhaan, Aval Kaal Aruge Madangi Vizhundhaan; Avan Enge Madangi Vizhundhaano Ange Madindhu Kidandhaan.
28 siseraavin Thaai Jannalil Nindru Palaganivazhiyaaip Paarththukkondirundhu: Avanudaiya Radham Varaamal Pindhipponadhenna? Avanudaiya Radhangalin Ottam Thaamadhikkiradhenna Endru Pulambinaal.
29 avaludaiya Naayagigalil Buththisaaligal Avalukku Uththaravu Sonnadhumandri, Aval Thaanum Thanakku Marumozhiyaaga:

30 avargal Kollaiyaik Kandu Pidikkavillaiyo, Adhaip Pangidavendaamo, Aalukku Irandoru Pengalaiyum, Siseraavukkuk Kollaiyitta Palavarunamaana Aadaigalaiyum, Kollaiyitta Palavarunamaana Siththirath Thaiyalaadaigalaiyum, Kollaiyittavargalin Kazhuththukku Irupuramum Porundhum Siththiraththaiyalulla Balavarunamaana Aadaiyaiyum Kodukkavendaamo Endraal.

31 karththaave, Ummaip Pagaikkira Yaavarum Ippadiye Azhiyakkadavargal; Yaavarum Ippadiye Azhiyakkadavargal; Avaril Anbukoorugiravargalo, Vallamaiyode Udhikkira Sooriyanaippola Irukkakkadavargal Endru Paadinaargal. Pinbu Dhesam Naarpadhu Varusham Amaidhalaayirundhadhu.
